bot.confused: You said: **%s**. Try asking for **help** or **order *reagent*** or **cancel *reagent* from *email***
bot.cancel: Absolutely, I'm canceling your order now.
bot.Order.title: Order
bot.Order.subtitle: Please confirm this order:
bot.order.invalidsearch: You entered an invalid reagent keyword. Please try again and enter: **Order *reagent***.
bot.order.noresults: There are no available reagents for your order attempt of **%s**.
bot.thanks: You are most welcome. I am always here when you need me.
bot.help: You seem to be asking for help on something. Try our [help](https://team-labyoke.herokuapp.com/help) section for a wealth of information and video tutorials or be. Anything else I can help you with?
bot.ordersuccessful: Your order has been successfully placed. A confirmation email has been sent to you.
bot.ordernotsuccessful: There was an issue while I tried to place your order. Please try again.
bot.Cancel.title: Cancel Order
bot.Cancel.subtitle: Please confirm this cancellation:
bot.cancel.invalidsearch: You entered invalid cancel keywords. Please try again and enter: **Cancel *reagent* from *email***.
bot.cancel.noresults: Sorry I could not find any reagent to cancel for: **%s**.
bot.cancelsuccessful: Your order has been successfully cancelled. A confirmation email has been sent to the requestor.
bot.cancelnotsuccessful: There was an issue while I tried to cancel the order. Please try again.
bot.greet: Hello there! My name's Professor L! What can I help you with? Try asking for **help** or **order *reagent*** or **cancel order *reagent* from *email***.
